content.raw:
@sloretz and @scpeters  approved the [associated Gazebo PR](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/3077/) so I’m tagging you two here \(sorry for the extra review\).

While there are a lot of lines of code in the diff, the actual changes are pretty simple:

* Create a copy of `contain_plugin/tutorial_7.md` and call it `contain_plugin/tutorail_9.md`
* Change references to `gazebo7` urls to `gazebo9` in `contain_plugin/tutorial_9.md`
* Make a few editorial changes to `contain_plugin/tutorial_9.md` so it’s not discussing gazebo-7 or gazebo-8
* Add a reference to the `contain_plugin/tutorial_9.md` to `manifest.xml`
* Remove `contain_plugin/TurnOnLightPlugin.cpp` and `contain_plugin/contain_example.world` since they’re not used anywhere \(the tutorial links to the mainline gazebo repo\)
content.html:
@sloretz and @scpeters approved the associated Gazebo PR so I’m tagging you two here (sorry for the extra review).

While there are a lot of lines of code in the diff, the actual changes are pretty simple:

  • Create a copy of contain_plugin/tutorial_7.md and call it contain_plugin/tutorail_9.md
  • Change references to gazebo7 urls to gazebo9 in contain_plugin/tutorial_9.md
  • Make a few editorial changes to contain_plugin/tutorial_9.md so it’s not discussing gazebo-7 or gazebo-8
  • Add a reference to the contain_plugin/tutorial_9.md to manifest.xml
  • Remove contain_plugin/TurnOnLightPlugin.cpp and contain_plugin/contain_example.world since they’re not used anywhere (the tutorial links to the mainline gazebo repo)
